answer: The meeting agenda includes: 1) Deciding which Winston Cup and Winston Drag events the 'KITA' band will perform at; 2) Selecting supporting events for band performances; 3) Defining layout options for event areas; 4) Agreeing on timing schedules for at-event activities; 5) Refining budget estimates for at-event activities; 6) Deciding on travel schedules for teams; 7) Creating venue guidelines for band scheduling; 8) Designing a communication system among involved groups; 9) Agreeing on timing for away-from-event activities; 10) Refining budget estimates for away-from-event activities; 11) Defining details of band and concert needs.
